name: 許益瑞
objective: 本課程將以從延伸高中化學為起始 (Chapter 1-6),然後逐步加入量子化學(Chapter 7-11)與近代化學的熱門課題. 課程內容除了包含計量化學,量子化學,熱化學,動力學,基本生化外,也將介紹學生如何使用現有的結構化學工具(電腦軟體及資料庫)來幫助學習.(此部分將以課後作業為主).希望學生在一學期的學習,可以了解當今化學的多樣性,以便為其將來更進一步興趣鋪路.
schedule:
week 1   Keys to the Study of Chemistry: Appendix A, B and C
week 2   The Atom in Modern Chemistry
week 3   Chemical Formulas, Equations, and Reaction Yields
week 4   Chemical Bonding : The Classical Description(I)
week 5   Chemical Bonding : The Classical Description(II)
week 6   Introduction to Quantum Mechanics (I)
week 7   Introduction to Quantum Mechanics (II)
week 8   Midterm
week 9   Quantum Mechanics and Atomic Structure(I)
week 10  Quantum Mechanics and Atomic Structure(II)
week 11  Quantum Mechanics and Atomic Structure(III)
week 12  Quantum Mechanics and Molecular Structure(I)
week 13  Quantum Mechanics and Molecular Structure(II)
week 14  Quantum Mechanics and Molecular Structure(III)
week 15  Bonding in Organic Molecules(I)
week 16  Bonding in Organic Molecules(II
week 17  Bonding in Transition Metal Compounds(I)
week 18  Final Exam.
scorePolicy:
期中考  40%
期末考  40%
作業/平時成績  20%
materials: Textbook : David W. Oxtoby, H.P. Gillis, Alan Campion, Hatem H. Helal, Kelly P. Gaither, Principles of Modern Chemistry, 7th ed., Brooks/Cole CENGAGE Learning
